Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.viewcontroller

Class OnlineLobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.viewcontroller.OnlineLobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewController
public class OnlineLobbyController extends Object implements ViewController
Class that controls the interactive elements in the onlineLobby scene and the reception of a JoinGameResponseEvent

  • Method Details

    • onTextFieldEnter

      public void onTextFieldEnter()
      Handles both the click of enter key inside the usernameField TextField and the click of the enterButton Button. If the length of the username is between MAX and MIN length, accepts it and empties the field

    • toggleEnterButtonClass

      public void toggleEnterButtonClass()
      Toggles the enterButton class according to the length of the string inside the usernameField
